posts.author: Shia_Luck
posts.content:
Do we have a tool these days to enable us to search previous builds so we are not duplicating something? Thanks :)

Have fun :)

posts.author: Yunim
posts.content: ECB Build Search: [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... index.html]

posts.author: Shia_Luck
posts.content:
Thank you very much Yunim :)

How up to date is it? I remember having to use an offline archive for a while for some older builds. That is not necessary now I take it?  Thanks again :)

Have fun :)

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Hi Shia

Yunim links to the ECB Archives which covers builds I believe to early 2011.
It is an excellent search tool and covers perhaps a few thousand builds
It only searches lvl 40 builds.


If you want even newer builds the team have been working on an updated guild archive. @DoesntPlayAnymore coded this in his spare time. This engine searches newer finalised level 40 builds between 2011 to mid 2019. https://neverwintervault.org/project/nw ... archive-v2

We are hoping to link the two together so we can have a 3000+ build search engine, however we are still looking for someone with the appropriate technical expertise.



Other ways to search is:

Tapatalk forum search (see the search bar above), not very fun to search

Google Search:

site:www.tapatalk.com/groups/nwnecbguild "Druid" "Monk"
Although this is less user friendly, those who are familiar with google search it may work well

posts.author: Shia_Luck
posts.content:
Hi Orion2019, thanks :)

@DoesntPlayAnymore sounds like a true hero if they really don't anymore. I wish I could help but my skillset does not include coding. This must be an update to what I had so thank you very much to all who helped put it together. I see some of the usual suspects in the credits *grin*.

Have fun :)

ECB Build Search: [https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... index.html]
